name: Reincarnation (itspablex)
description:
Robots

Blue Robot - able to move electric platforms with his antenna

Controller: you need to left-click an interactable electric platform and move with WASD. To close this selection press Esc

Yellow Robot - able to shoot laser in order to activate interactable buttons

Controller: Shoot with left click

Green Robot - able to jump

Controller: Jump by holding space. The more time you hold the space bar, the higher you jump

Red Robot - able to destroy wood in order to open the path

Controller: left click the wood. You need to be beside the wood you are wlling to destroy

Developers

itspablex, Gabriecraft88, mikiwiii and zen.
